description.value:
While you still have the necessary training to employ heavy weapons, you've learned that it's important to keep a backup for when foes get too close. You may be a skilled Veskarium trooper who knows their way around a doshko, or a devotee of Zon-Shelyn who brings holy wrath with a painglaive. Blows with heavy close combat weapons punish your foes just as effectively as when you fire a rotolaser or a missile launcher.

When you successfully make a Strike with a two-handed melee weapon, you @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.conditions.Item.enA7BxAjBb7ns1iF]{Suppress} the target until the start of your next turn. In addition, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.actions.Item.rgZ9EvqnyGdafiMv]{Punitive Strike} reaction.
